title: Identifying the Solution
text: To isolate $$y$$, multiply both sides by the LCD. Find the LCD by multiplying the two denominators of the fraction.

title: Simplifying the Equation
text: Simplify both sides by reducing and eliminating the denominater under the variable.

title: Divide
